description:
NFA - no restrictions on trees at this address.  T1 Mature Sycamore, located in the LH corner of the rear garden. This tree has started to outgrow it's location and is blocking out valuable light into the garden/property and neighbouring properties. It does however offer good amenity value and screening. Therefore In order to control growth, shape and contain suggested works are too:
a)	Reduce height by approx. 50% to suitable new growth points.
b)	Reduce and re shape sides by approx. 1 meter retaining screening value.
c)	Remove deadwood and weak suppressed branches and ivy from crown
T2. Magnolia, situated in the front garden. The tree offers excellent screening from the road but has started to outgrow its location. In order to shape and contain suggested works are too:
a)	Reduce and reshape crown by approx. 50% (back to previous points of reduction)
b)	Retain furnishing growth throughout the crown and low level screening
